languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, согласно корабельному реестру, перед нами механический ковчег "Герметико". Мы запеленговали вокс-сигнал, исходящий с него".
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, according to the ship's registry, we're looking at the Ark Mechanicus Hermetico. We picked up a vox-signal coming from her."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, согласно корабельному реестру, перед нами механический ковчег "Герметико". Мы запеленговали вокс-сигнал, исходящий с него".

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, according to the ship's registry, we're looking at the Ark Mechanicus Hermetico. We picked up a vox-signal coming from her."
"{mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, according to the ship's registry, we're looking at the Ark Mechanicus Hermetico. We picked up a vox-signal coming from her."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, according to the ship's registry, we're looking at the Ark Mechanicus Hermetico. We picked up a vox-signal coming from her."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, according to the ship's registry, we're looking at the Ark Mechanicus Hermetico. We picked up a vox-signal coming from her."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, according to the ship's registry, we're looking at the Ark Mechanicus Hermetico. We picked up a vox-signal coming from her."

languages.text: “舰长大人，根据舰船的登记信息，我们眼前的这艘船正是机械方舟‘隐士之舟号’。我们收到了这艘舰船发来的音阵信号。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, according to the ship's registry, we're looking at the Ark Mechanicus Hermetico. We picked up a vox-signal coming from her."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，根据舰船的登记信息，我们眼前的这艘船正是机械方舟‘隐士之舟号’。我们收到了这艘舰船发来的音阵信号。”

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, d'après le registre du vaisseau, nous faisons face à l'Arche Mechanicus Hermetico. Nous avons capté un signal-vox en provenance de cette dernière. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, according to the ship's registry, we're looking at the Ark Mechanicus Hermetico. We picked up a vox-signal coming from her."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, d'après le registre du vaisseau, nous faisons face à l'Arche Mechanicus Hermetico. Nous avons capté un signal-vox en provenance de cette dernière. »

languages.text: «{mf|Milord|Milady}, según el registro de la nave, tenemos ante nosotros a la Hermetico, el Arca del Mechanicus. Hemos captado una señal de voco proveniente de esta nave».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, according to the ship's registry, we're looking at the Ark Mechanicus Hermetico. We picked up a vox-signal coming from her."

traits.locale_text: «{mf|Milord|Milady}, según el registro de la nave, tenemos ante nosotros a la Hermetico, el Arca del Mechanicus. Hemos captado una señal de voco proveniente de esta nave».

languages.text: 「陛下、船籍を確認しましたところ、あれはアーク・メカニカス、ヘルメティコ号です。あの船からのヴォクス信号を拾いました」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, according to the ship's registry, we're looking at the Ark Mechanicus Hermetico. We picked up a vox-signal coming from her."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、船籍を確認しましたところ、あれはアーク・メカニカス、ヘルメティコ号です。あの船からのヴォクス信号を拾いました」

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, laut Schiffsregister handelt es sich um die Mechanicus-Arche Hermetico. Wir haben ein Voxsignal von ihr empfangen."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, according to the ship's registry, we're looking at the Ark Mechanicus Hermetico. We picked up a vox-signal coming from her."

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, laut Schiffsregister handelt es sich um die Mechanicus-Arche Hermetico. Wir haben ein Voxsignal von ihr empfangen."

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Geminin kayıtlarına göre bu gördüğümüz, Ark Mechanicus Hermetico olmalı. Gemiden bir voks sinyali alıyoruz."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, according to the ship's registry, we're looking at the Ark Mechanicus Hermetico. We picked up a vox-signal coming from her."
